title: Calculate SHA-256 Hash (Node.js)
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a SHA-256 hash using Node.js. The SHA-256 algorithm is commonly used to create secure digital signatures and to verify the integrity of data. With the help of the `crypto` module in Node.js, we will create a function that can take any value and return its SHA-256 hash as a promise.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
